src:
Hasil Lengkap Liga Champions Pekan Keempat dan Klasemen
07 Nov 2019, 03:44 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Rangkaian pertandingan Liga Champions pekan keempat sudah usai digelar. Tiga tim memastikan diri lolos ke babak 16 besar, yakni Juventus, Bayern Munchen, dan Paris Saint-Germain.
Paris Saint-Germain, yang berlaga di Grup A pada Kamis dinihari WIB, lolos setelah menang 1-0 atas Club Brugge. Gol tunggal tim Prancis ke gawang klub Belgia itu dicetak Mauro Icardi pada menit 22.
Hasil ini mengantar PSG melaju dengan mengemas nilai 12, unggul 5 poin dari Real Madrid di posisi ketiga. Dengan dua laga tersisa, nilai PSG tak mungkin dikejar Club Brugge (2) yang ada di posisi ketiga.
Real Madrid sendiri menjaga harapan untuk lolos setelah menang 6-0 atas Galatasaray. Tiga gol Madrid dicetak Rodrygo (4, 7, 90), dua gol diceploskan Karim Benzema (45, 81), dan gol lain diceploskan Sergio Ramos (13/penalti).
Dari Grup B, Bayern Munchen merebut tiket 16 besar setelah mengalahkan tamunya Olympiakos 2-0. Gol klub Jerman itu diceploskan Robert Lewandowski (69) dan Ivan Perisic (89).
Kemenangan tersebut membuat Bayern mengoleksi 12 poin di pucuk klasemen. Dengan dua laga tersisa, nilianya tak mungkin dikejar tim urutan ketiga, Red Star Belgrade (3).
Bayern diuntungkan karena di laga lain Red Star Belgrade ditekuk Tottenham Hotspur 0-4. Dua gol Son Heung-min (57, 61) serta gol Le Celso (34) dan Christian Eriksen (85) menempatkan Tottenham di posisi kedua dengan nilai 7.
Dari Grup C, laju Manchester City ke babak 16 besar tertunda karena mereka tertahan 1-1 di kandang Atalanta. Unggul berkat gol Raheem Sterling (7), City kebobolan oleh gol Mario Pasalic (49).
Manchester City masih memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 10, disusul Shaktar Donetsk dan Dinamo Zagreb yang sama-sama mengemas nilai 5. The Citizens belum bisa meraih tiket 16 besar karena nilainya masih mungkin dikejar Zagreb dalam dua laga tersisa.
Dari Grup D, Juventus lolos ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions setelah meraih kemenangan 2-1 atas tuan rumah Lokomotiv Moscow.
Juve memimpin terlebih dahulu melalui gol Aaron Ramsey, sebelum Aleksey Miranchuk menyamakan kedudukan bagi klub Rusia. Douglas Costa kemudian menjadi pahlawan La Vecchia Signora dengan golnya pada fase akhir laga.
Tambahan tiga poin membawa Juve naik ke pucuk klasemen Grup D dengan koleksi 10 poin, yang sekaligus memastikan mereka menyelesaikan fase grup di posisi dua besar. Sedangkan Lokomotiv (3 poin) tertahan di peringkat ketiga dan nasibnya ditentukan hasil lawatan Atletico Madrid (7) ke markas Bayer Leverkusen (0).
Barcelona masih mampu memuncaki klasemen meski ditahan Slavia Praha dengan skor 0-0 dalam lanjutan Liga Champions pekan keempat di Camp Nou, Rabu dinihari WIB, 6 November 2019.
Barcelona kini mengemas nilai 8 dari 4 laga. Klub asal Spanyol itu mengungguli Borussia Dortmund (7), diikuti Inter Milan (4) dan Slavia (2).
Dortmund sendiri mampu menang 3-1 saat menjamu Inter Milan. Dua gol Dortmund diborong Achraf Hakimi (51, 77), yang dilengkapi Julian Brandt (64). Gol Inter diceploskan Lautaro Martinez (5) dan Matias Vecino (40).
Dari Grup E, juara bertahan Liverpool menang 2-1 saat menjamu Genk. Gol The Reds dicetak Georginio Wijnaldum (menit 14) dan Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. Sedangkan gol tim tamu asal Belgia dicetak Mbwana Samata (41). Di grup sama, Napoli ditahan Salzburg 1-1.
Kini Liverpool memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 9 dari 4 laga, menggeser Napoli yang turun ke urutan kedua (8). Salzburg di posisi ketiga (4) dan Genk di dasar klasemen (1).
Dari Grup G, Lyon mengalahkan Benfica, sedanglan Leipzig menang 2-0 di kandang Zenit St. Petersburg. Kini Leipzig memuncaki klasemen (nilai 9), diikuti Lyon (7), Zenit (4), dan Benfica (3).
Dari Grup H, Chelsea bermain imbang 4-4 saat menjamu Ajax. Pertandingan berlangsung seru dan menarik.
Gol Chelsea dicetak Jorginho (5 dan 71, dari penalti), Cesar Azpilicueta (63), Reece James (74). Gol Ajax tercipta dari bunuh diri Tammy Abraham (2) dan Kepa Arrizabalaga (35). Gol lainnya diceploskanQuincy Promes (20) dan Donny van de Beek (55).
Dua pemain Ajax terkena kartu merah, Daley Blind dan Joel Veltman. Sedangkan gol Cesar Azpilicueta (78) dianulir karena VAR.
Kini Ajax memuncaki klasemen dengan niali 7, sama dengan Chelsea dan Valencia yang ada di bawahnya. Valencia sendiri mampu menang 4-1 atas Lille dalam laga pekan ini.
Hasil lengkap Liga Champions pekan keempat
Grup AParis Saint-Germain 1 - 0 Club BruggeReal Madrid 6 - 0 Galatasaray
Grup BBayern Munchen 2 - 0 OlympiacosRed Star Belgrade 0 - 4 Tottenham Hotspur
Grup CAtalanta 1 - 1 Manchester CityDinamo Zagreb 3 - 2 Shakhtar Donetsk
Grup DLokomotiv Moscow 1 - 2 JuventusBayer Leverkusen 2 - 1 Atletico Madrid
Grup ELiverpool 2 - 1 GenkNapoli 1 - 1 Salzburg
Grup FBarcelona 0 - 0 Slavia PragueBorussia Dortmund 3 - 2 Inter
Grup GZenit St. Petersburg 0 - 2 LeipzigLyon 3 - 1 Benfica
Grup HChelsea 4 - 4 AjaxValencia 4 - 1 Lille.
Selanjutnya: Klasemen Liga Champions
Klasemen Liga Champions pekan keempat
12 Selanjutnya
text:
Complete Week 4 Champions League results and Standings
Nov 7 2019, 03:44 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The fourth week of the Champions League matches has already been held. Three teams made sure to qualify for the last 16, namely Juventus, Bayern Munich and Paris Saint-Germain.
Paris Saint-Germain, who competed in Group A on Thursday morning, escaped after a 1-0 win over Club Brugge. The French team's single goal against the Belgian club was scored by Mauro Icardi on 22 minutes.
These results led PSG to advance by packing a value of 12, winning 5 points from Real Madrid in third position. With two matches remaining, PSG is not likely to be pursued by Club Brugge (2) who are in third position.
Real Madrid itself kept hopes of qualifying after a 6-0 win over Galatasaray. Three Madrid goals scored by Rodrygo (4, 7, 90), two goals struck Karim Benzema (45, 81), and another goal scored by Sergio Ramos (13 / penalty).
From Group B, Bayern Munich won the last 16 of the ticket after defeating Olympiakos 2-0 guests. German club goals scored by Robert Lewandowski (69) and Ivan Perisic (89).
The victory made Bayern collect 12 points at the top of the standings. With two matches left, the value is not possible to be chased by third-placed team, Red Star Belgrade (3).
Bayern benefited because in another match Red Star Belgrade were beaten Tottenham Hotspur 0-4. Two goals from Son Heung-min (57, 61) and goals from Le Celso (34) and Christian Eriksen (85) put Tottenham in second with a score of 7.
From Group C, Manchester City's pace to the round of 16 was delayed because they were held 1-1 at home to Atalanta. Superior thanks to Raheem Sterling's goal (7), City conceded by Mario Pasalic's goal (49).
Manchester City still tops the standings with a value of 10, followed by Shaktar Donetsk and Dinamo Zagreb who both pack a value of 5. The Citizens have not been able to win a ticket 16 because the value is still possible to be pursued by Zagreb in the remaining two matches.
From Group D, Juventus qualified for the last 16 of the Champions League after a 2-1 victory over hosts Lokomotiv Moscow.
Juve took the lead through Aaron Ramsey's goal, before Aleksey Miranchuk equalized for the Russian club. Douglas Costa later became the hero of La Vecchia Signora with his goal in the final phase of the fight.
An additional three points bring Juve up to the top of Group D with a collection of 10 points, which also ensures they complete the group phase in the top two. While Lokomotiv (3 points) is stuck in third place and his fate is determined by the results of Atletico Madrid's visit (7) to the Bayer Leverkusen headquarters (0).
Barcelona is still able to top the standings despite being held by Slavia Prague with a score of 0-0 in the Champions League continued fourth week at Camp Nou, Wednesday morning WIB, 6 November 2019.
Barcelona now pack the value of 8 out of 4 matches. The Spanish club outperformed Borussia Dortmund (7), followed by Inter Milan (4) and Slavia (2).
Dortmund itself was able to win 3-1 at home to Inter Milan. Achraf Hakimi's two goals from Dortmund (51, 77), completed by Julian Brandt (64). Inter goals struck by Lautaro Martinez (5) and Matias Vecino (40).
From Group E, defending champions Liverpool won 2-1 at home to Genk. The Reds scored by Georginio Wijnaldum (minute 14) and Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. While the visitors from Belgium scored goals Mbwana Samata (41). In the same group, Napoli held Salzburg 1-1.
Now Liverpool top the standings with a value of 9 from 4 matches, shifting Napoli who fell to second (8). Salzburg is third (4) and Genk is bottom (1).
From Group G, Lyon beat Benfica, while Leipzig won 2-0 at home to Zenit St. Petersburg. Now Leipzig tops the standings (9 points), followed by Lyon (7), Zenit (4) and Benfica (3).
From Group H, Chelsea drew 4-4 when entertaining Ajax. The match was exciting and interesting.
Chelsea goals scored by Jorginho (5 and 71, from penalty), Cesar Azpilicueta (63), Reece James (74). Ajax's goal was created from the suicide of Tammy Abraham (2) and Kepa Arrizabalaga (35). Other goals were posted by Quincy Promes (20) and Donny van de Beek (55).
Two Ajax players were hit by red cards, Daley Blind and Joel Veltman. While Cesar Azpilicueta's goal (78) was disallowed because of VAR.
Now Ajax topped the standings with 7 points, the same as Chelsea and Valencia below. Valencia itself was able to win 4-1 over Lille in this week's match.
Complete Champions League results for the fourth week
Group AParis Saint-Germain 1 - 0 Club Brugge Real Madrid 6 - 0 Galatasaray
BBayern Munchen Group 2 - 0 Olympiacos Red Star Belgrade 0 - 4 Tottenham Hotspur
CAtalanta Group 1 - 1 Manchester City Dinamo Zagreb 3 - 2 Shakhtar Donetsk
DLokomotiv Moscow Group 1-2 JuventusBayer Leverkusen 2-1 Atletico Madrid
ELiverpool Group 2 - 1 GenkNapoli 1 - 1 Salzburg
FBarcelona Group 0 - 0 Slavia PragueBorussia Dortmund 3 - 2 Inter
St. GZenit Group Petersburg 0 - 2 LeipzigLyon 3 - 1 Benfica
HChelsea Group 4 - 4 AjaxValencia 4 - 1 Lille.
